name: Disruptive Dungeons
description:
Play the role of SP-1N, a robot who's been captured by a gang of scrappers. Explore their dungeon, destroying enemy robots along the way. As you traverse their dungeon, you may come across "Disruption Fields," generated fields that mess with your systems, blocking access to certain subsystems like weapons, abilities, jumping, or accelerating.

Note: I have not been able to test the mac or linux versions, so it is very likely they will not work at all. There are also almost certainly many bugs since this is a game jam, any notable bugs will be listed in a comment below.

Things I plan on adding if I ever come back to this game:

  • More rooms
  • Actually use the disruptive fields for jump/acceleration
  • More enemy types
  • Build the story into the actual game
  • Rework the generation algorithm to prioritize large rooms and allow for more stages, making a true roguelite
